text: The district of Delémont is one of three districts in Jura, Switzerland. Its capital is the city of Delémont. The district is nearly all French-speaking and is home to a population of 35,175 (end of 2005). Delémont is divided into 28 municipalities: Municipality Population (31 Dec 2005) Area, km² Bassecourt 3328 15.57 Boécourt 833 12.28 Bourrignon 288 13.56 Châtillon 433 5.33 Corban 458 7.87 Courchapoix 418 6.40 Courfaivre 1561 12.40 Courrendlin 2360 11.07 Courroux 2979 19.71 Courtételle 2218 13.56 Delémont 11,266 22.03 Develier 1300 12.42 Ederswiler 124 3.32 Glovelier 1195 14.34 Mervelier 578 9.70 Mettembert 126 2.41 Montsevelier 519 7.75 Movelier 408 8.01 Pleigne 400 17.83 Rebeuvelier 375 8.42 Rossemaison 569 1.89 Saulcy 264 7.89 Soulce 257 14.68 Soyhières 467 7.55 Undervelier 306 14.00 Vellerat 69 2.04 Vermes 332 18.32 Vicques 1744 12.75 Total 35,175 303.10 Category:Delémont District
title: Delémont District
